thread.title: Malaysia five-star cat hotel with a spa and dating service
thread.title_full: Malaysia five-star cat hotel with a spa and dating service

title: Malaysia five-star cat hotel with a spa and dating service
text: comments Just because their owners are heading off on holiday doesn't mean cats don't also deserve a break from the rat race. A luxury hotel in Damansara, outside Kuala Lumpur, has been set up to offer pampered moggies the ultimate stay with services including playtime, grooming and dating for female felines on heat. Catzonia has four room types with the top end Very Very Important Cat (VVIC) bedrooms featuring a mini playground, 24 hour temperature control and three beds so that pet families can stay together. Guests are served three 'special' meals a day. The 35-bedroom hotel's website states: 'We believe that cats need holidays too. 'They always prefer to be treated as a boss. It means the environment must be felt like home, always being cuddled and hugged, and most importantly they don't want to feel lonely.' Indulged animals can stay at the hotel for three hours or for up to a year. Worried owners who like to keep an eye on their furry friends can monitor them via their mobile phone, 24 hours a day. Living like an aristo-cat: The inside of the 35-bedroom Catzonia cat hotel in Damansara, Malaysia Staff play with cats inside the Very Very Important Cat (VVIC) room, which features a mini playground, 24-hour temperature control and three beds so that families can stay together Every room has CCTV run with an Internet protocol camera so that worried owners can keep an eye on their furry friends while they're apart The cat's pajamas: Pampered moggies enjoy their stay in the Very Very Important Cat (VVIC) room while an owner Christopher, 34, takes a picture of his pet RELATED ARTICLES
